amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt from the bill any rule or guidance pertaining to public health or safety.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 248 (Roll no. 26).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 248 (Roll no. 26).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Connolly.
